column4: I installed mozilla-mplayer plugin but firefox is not recognizing it. someone help me?
have you tried watching a movie online?
at a terminal -- ls -l /usr/lib/firefox/plugins   -- and paste the output in the pastebin
its a webpage -- open it up and submit your contents -- a url is then given to you which you can share with us
Can I send you now a document with the output?
sorry, no, can you post again please?
Pastebin is returning errors. May I send to your e-mail?
I see you have the totem-mozilla package installed too -- it probably is conflicting with mozilla-mplayer
uninstall it -- sudo aptitude purge totem-mozilla
ubuntu-desktop is just a dummy package and can be removed with no damage done
